message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think would be of great value to you. I'm asking for $11,500 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While I understand your price point, I'm still hoping for a bit more. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  Would you be open to that?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
